;;了解更多...;保罗·希尔Mon, 13 Jan 2025 13:42:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/smartphone-sector-returns-to-yearly-growth-after-two-years/ #智能手机#Counterpoint 全球最薄折叠手机 OPPO Find N5 将于 2 月上市https://www.neowin.net/news/the-worlds-thinnest-folding-phone-the-oppo-find-n5-is-coming-in-february/
;;
;虽然有关其薄度的详细信息尚未公布，但 OPPO 首席执行官声称即将推出的Find N5 将是世界上最薄的可折叠手机。 ;阅读更多... ;萨加尔·纳雷什·巴夫萨尔Mon, 13 Jan 2025 13:14:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/the-worlds-thinnest-folding-phone-the-oppo-find-n5-is-coming-in-february/ #OPPO #FindN5 #Foldable @@SNB3112 Yamaha RX-A2A 7.2 4K AVR 配备 Dolby Atmos/Vision、Cinema DSP 等，售价仅为 600 美元https://www.neowin.net/deals/yamaha-rx-a2a-72-4k-avr-with-dolby-atmosvision-cinema-dsp-and-more-is-priced-just-600/
;;

;;

;;
;台湾半导体公司台积电预计第四季度利润较去年同期增长58% 2023 年。这是由人工智能驱动的。 ;了解更多...;保罗·希尔Mon, 13 Jan 2025 10:36:02 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/tsmc-predicted-to-report-58-leap-in-fourth-quarter-profits-this-week/ #台积电 高兴的 Linus Torvalds 愿意为一位幸运的 Linux 开发者打造一个吉他踏板https://www.neowin.net/news/a-happy-linus-torvalds-is-offering-to-build-a-guitar-pedal-for-one-lucky-linux-dev/
;;
;莱纳斯·托瓦尔兹是这个假期对他个人和职业生活的进展非常满意。因此，他主动提出为一位幸运的开发人员制作一个吉他踏板。 ;阅读更多...;萨彦森Mon, 13 Jan 2025 08:52:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/a-happy-linus-torvalds-is-offering-to-build-a-guitar-pedal-for-one-lucky-linux-dev/ #LinusTorvalds #Linux #Bday 三星推出“Galaxy Easy Compensation”计划以促进回收https://www.neowin.net/news/samsung-launches-galaxy-easy-compensation-program-to-promote-recycling/
;;
;三星推出“Galaxy Easy Compensation”该计划旨在促进回收并帮助减少电子废物。 ;了解更多...;萨加尔·纳雷什·巴夫萨尔Mon, 13 Jan 2025 07:32:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/samsung-launches-galaxy-easy-compensation-program-to-promote-recycling/ #三星 #Galaxy #Recycle @@SNB3112 4TB SanDisk Professional 坚固防水 PRO-G40 Thunderbolt SSD 最低价出售https://www.neowin.net/deals/4tb-sandisk-professional-rugged-waterproof-pro-g40-thunderbolt-ssd- sell-for-lowest-price/
;;
;IP68 防尘防水 SanDisk Professional PRO-G40 4TB 外置 SSD 现已上市，价格比平时有 17% 的折扣。阅读更多... ;萨加尔·纳雷什·巴夫萨尔Mon, 13 Jan 2025 05:54:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/deals/4tb-sandisk-professional-rugged-waterproof-pro-g40-thunderbolt-ssd- sell-for-lowest-price/ #SSD #SanDisk #Amazon #Deal @@SNB3112 小米推出新款中端手机和可穿戴设备，配备高端规格https://www.neowin.net/news/xiaomis-new-mid-tier-phones-and-wearables-are-announced-sporting-high-end-specations/
;;
